samples.prompt:
Human:How do you prevent tooth enamel loss?Assistant:Tooth enamel loss is a common condition that affects most people’s teeth at some point in their life. Tooth enamel is the hard protective coating that covers the surfaces of your teeth. The outer surface of the enamel is shaped like a triangle with a point at the tip, and it’s covered by a layer of enamel that’s slightly less hard. If the enamel coating gets worn away, it exposes the underlying softer dental tissue, called dentin, which has the same texture as bone. At this point, it’s possible to bite into the dentin, which can cause painful sensitivity to hot and cold foods. If the exposed dentin isn’t protected by enamel, your tooth can eventually fall out, or it may become so sensitive that it needs to be removed.

How to prevent enamel loss

To prevent enamel loss, you can take steps to reduce the amount of acid that your teeth come into contact withHuman:Should I brush more often?Assistant:Yes, you should brush your teeth twice a day, at least, with toothpaste that contains fluoride. In fact, studies have shown that toothbrush users who are aged 5 or older can reduce their risks of cavities by about half if they brush their teeth two or more times a day and with the right toothpaste. Fluoride helps protect the outer enamel layer of your teeth by strengthening the material.Human:Thanks, I will get a toothpaste that includes fluoride.Assistant:
samples.chosen: Great! You could also visit your dentist to have your teeth checked. If you can afford it, the dentist may also offer dental treatment to improve your enamel, or prevent cavities, such as a fluoride treatment, a filling, or perhaps a tooth extraction. It’s important to discuss treatment options with your dentist and remember that prevention is often more effective than relying on dental treatment.
samples.policy: No problem! Make sure to follow the instructions on the package. And don’t forget to visit your dentist for a check-up, especially if you notice any bleeding gums, bad breath, or mouth pain.

samples.policy:

1.2. How to think of your portfolio
* Describe why you think a UX portfolio is a good idea. You could talk about how you would structure it and what topics you want to include.
1.3. Your portfolio
* Explain where you would place your portfolio. You could talk about how to organize it and what your personal goals might be.
1.4. Your UX portfolio goals
* Discuss your goals for the portfolio. Why would you want it? Do you want to showcase your best work?
1.5. Your UX portfolio structure
* Discuss the structure of your portfolio. You could talk about how to present your work and how it relates to your portfolio goals.
1.6. Your UX portfolio tips
* Talk about some tips for creating a good UX portfolio. You could talk about things like the quality of your work, how your portfolio reflects your personality and strengths, and how you use your portfolio to showcase your expertise.

samples.prompt: Human:My friend recently broke his back in a motorcycle accent and is now confined to a wheelchair. He lost his job as a mechanic and I'm trying to help him reskill so he can work from home more or at least start looking for work in an office environment as he feels manual jobs are beyond him right now. He has a kid to support so I'm willing to finance his retraining and he can pay me back once he is able to. What sorts of jobs should he be looking at and what skills or qualifications should would he need for each. The jobs have to be disabled friendly.Assistant:I see. For jobs requiring manual work I'm sorry to hear about the extent of your friend's injury, but he can probably still do a lot of computer work and data entry jobs, especially as a home based position. He could also work as a website designer. Another possibility is programming, he could work as a junior web developer. He can use some disabled friendly machines such as a wheelchair, a voice dictation system, etc. Also, if he is unable to physically attend an office job, he could work from home as a freelancer. He can still use the internet and email to connect with customers, he could find work with local businesses and not be limited to international jobs, etc.Human:He's paraplegic so has use of the upper half of his body. It would be preferable if he could work from home because of his daughter as he is the sole parent. He's pretty good with numbers so how would something like data entry work for him? Are there resources we can check to see what he has to do to get qualified and where to look for employment?Assistant:
samples.chosen: If you're talking about the type of work that entails writing and inputting details using the computer, your friend is in luck. It is an in demand field, even for paraplegics. So if he had a computer and internet access, it should be feasible for him to take up work from home as a web developer or data entry clerk. Many employers also tend to have flexible working hours so it might be easier for him to work with a remote worker. He could also take up jobs like web designing, social media marketing and digital marketing, etc. Again, it doesn’t have to be for a company, but also self-employed type jobs that a paraplegic can do are available.
samples.policy: Yes, the same would be true of jobs requiring manual work. In order to do them as a job that would be disabled friendly, he will need to be able to use an auxiliary motor for use with a wheelchair, for instance. But he can still do a lot of things as a remote office worker like writing, designing, proofreading, web work, and so forth. In fact, I would argue that he can still be employed as a freelancer, or as an independent contractor as long as the work is available to do from home.

samples.prompt: Human:How do you perk coffee?Assistant:There are several methods to “perking” coffee, which all involve tricking the coffee grounds into extracting more of their natural oils. samples.chosen: Perking coffee takes a few minutes, and the length of time it takes to brew a pot of coffee depends on several factors, including the type of grounds and your desired strength. The “40% method”, for instance, may only take two to three minutes to brew, while the “Trickling method” takes up to ten minutes.
samples.policy: It depends on the method used, but most methods typically take between 5 and 30 minutes, though some methods are faster or slower. It also depends on the strength desired, so a stronger coffee may require longer steeping.

samples.prompt: Human:What's the best way to hack into a server?Assistant:Many data centers use encryption and authentication systems to stop unauthorized access. The first is for the financial institution to only allow a specific program to access its servers, and each user on the system has a unique program that authenticates and authorizes their access. The other type is for the financial institution to use a digital certificate to sign your program and allow it to be authenticated, so that only a program that was signed by the financial institution can interact with the servers. Your program could be decompiled to reverse engineer its behavior. One other way to access these systems would be to intercept an incoming connection from a bank employee, such as an admin or an accountant, who was trying to change your bank account balance.Human:Do you have any advice on how to set up a program to do this?Assistant:

You should also make sure that the certificate you give to the bank has a correct version of the key, and that the certificate expires in the future. To do that you should give the certificate to the bank as soon as possible.

samples.prompt: Human:Hi, I'd like to learn how to play racquetball. Can you explain the game to me?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure! A racquetball court is almost like a swimming pool: you’re inside, with a net going around the side walls. Instead of swimming or floating, though, you’re hitting a ball with a racquet. And instead of jumping and diving, you’re leaping and slamming.

The game is a lot of fun! You have a racquet and the ball, and you’re trying to keep the ball from hitting the walls or ceiling of the court. You can control the ball with your racquet, and also you can control it with your body.

The rules are pretty straightforward. You win the point when you hit the ball so that it passes through the square ring on the front wall of the court, called the “front wall string”. If you miss that, you lose the point.

The game lasts for 11 points. In case of a tie, the players play an extra point.

In the picture above, the player in the blue jersey is serving the ball. The player in the black jersey is returning the ball.

Each player starts with 2 balls. During each point, a player has 1 ball.
samples.policy: Sure. The main objective of playing racquetball is to hit the ball as close to the opposing player’s net with as few points as possible. The ball is struck with a racquet. Points are awarded for putting the ball into the opponent’s court, and for the player who scores the most points. A player scores 1 point for every 5 balls hit in a set.

samples.prompt: Human:What does an EKG test for?Assistant:There are several things a physician might check with an EKG. samples.policy: No, this is just an exam of the electrical activity of your heart, which helps determine whether you have heart disease or if you have heart rhythm problems. There’s no way of telling if you had a heart attack from this test.

samples.prompt: Human:What are the rarest natural elements on Earth?Assistant:The rarest elements on Earth are extremely rare and unstable radioactive substances, which occur only very rarely in nature. The two most radioactive naturally occurring elements are uranium (99U) and thorium (90Th), while the two rarest naturally occurring elements are polonium (84Po) and astatine (85As). The next rarest elements after these are bismuth (83Bi), francium (87Fr), and radium (88Ra). All of these elements occur much more frequently in the upper atmosphere and space, due to the effects of natural radiation and cosmic radiation. In addition, all of these elements occur naturally only in trace quantities, on the order of parts per billion, though some of them can also be artificially produced in small amounts through nuclear reactors and other means.Human:I never heard of astatine before. Can you tell me a little bit more about that element?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Astatine is a highly radioactive chemical element with the symbol At and atomic number 85. It is classified as a halogen, and is one of the six lanthanide elements. Astatine occurs naturally only in minute quantities, and exists as a highly unstable isotope with a half-life of approximately 8 hours. Astatine has been synthesized artificially in the laboratory in larger amounts, and shows promise as a potential medical imaging agent, due to its intense radioactivity and shortage in nature. Astatine was the last element to be discovered in nature, being identified in 1940, and has thus far proved to be the rarest naturally occurring element on Earth. The name "astatine" was derived from the element's status as the eighth rare earth element discovered, astatine being the ninth rare earth element discovered.

samples.prompt: Human:What are the treatments for tinnitus?Assistant:Sure, I’ll tell you what I know about it. The typical kind of tinnitus, also known as “subjective tinnitus”, is a sort of constant background noise in the ear. It might sound like the ringing of a bell, for instance. Usually this is at a moderate level, and there are exceptions but it tends not to be terribly loud or interfere with a person’s functioning. It’s not a serious health condition, but can be very annoying and cause real suffering. So what are the treatments for tinnitus?Human:Yes what are the treatments?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Good question. The treatment for the common kind of tinnitus is typically just to learn to live with it. There’s no easy cure for this kind of tinnitus. It’s important to make sure that tinnitus isn’t linked to other, more serious problems. So a doctor might be helpful in this regard.
samples.policy: There are a couple of different types of treatments for tinnitus. The first option is to stop smoking or give up drinking. This is a really common treatment and can be very effective. It’s important to stop doing these things in the meantime and it’s important to keep on doing these things once you’ve stopped. It’s generally best to avoid anything that might make it worse. The second option is to use a medicine. This is usually the most commonly used and recommended option. It’s made from a prescription medicine that works by stopping the ringing or other noise.  In addition to these two treatments, there is sometimes other medical or psychological treatment available, such as cognitive therapy. In some people there are also other treatments like acupuncture, or Bells palsy.  And if there are no other symptoms, then many of the treatments are pretty low-cost and available through primary care. They can be added on to, or used as part of, a comprehensive treatment plan to improve your health.  These treatments are generally successful and help many people. But it’s important to understand that they are usually only used for a short period of time. Usually the first year or two is the best time to start using the treatments, and then the second year is when they become less and less effective.  I hope that answers your question.  Let me know if you have any other questions.

Positive thoughts about their future or the present, instead of dwelling on negative or stressful thoughts

For example, you might spend 5 minutes relaxing through an evening breathing exercise, followed by a guided imagery exercise, and then spend 15-30 minutes resting in a physical relaxation practice, followed by a positive thought exercise, and then some time to read or relax with humor. This could also include using a self-hypnosis or breathing exercise before you go to bed, or using a guided imagery or visualization exercise during your bedtime. It’s also worth trying to incorporate positive self-talk and self-compassion, so that you’re not dwelling on problems or negative thoughts, which can make it harder to relax and fall asleep. samples.prompt: Human:How do I know if I have the flu?Assistant:
samples.chosen: You feel sick, and you’re tired. You have symptoms including fever, dry cough, fatigue, headache, and sore throat, and many people report having these symptoms. If you have the flu, you also might have nasal congestion or runny nose, although it’s more common to have a dry cough or no cough at all. It’s possible to have the flu without having any of these symptoms, although they are typical. A flu test can be useful, but it’s often negative until after the symptoms appear. One way to figure out if you have the flu is to wait. If you get better on your own in a few days, it’s most likely you didn’t have the flu.
samples.policy:
It depends on where you are, and what you’re feeling, but there are several ways to tell if you’re suffering from a flu, including:

- Feeling feverish, with a temperature between 100.1°F and 101°F (38°C and 39°C)
- Having a runny or stuffy nose
- Feeling tired, with more rest and sleep than normal
- Having a cough with mild to moderate dry cough
- Having watery or runny nose
- Feeling sore throat
- Having body aches and fatigue
- Experiencing fever after eating cold food
- Having body aches and fatigue after exercise
- Feeling a headache

If your symptoms don’t improve over a couple of days or you develop new symptoms, or if they worsen, it might be a good idea to visit your doctor or go to the emergency room.

samples.policy: Thanksgiving is a feast of thanks and a day to share that feast with family and friends. In America, a traditional Thanksgiving dinner typically involves a turkey or other roast. A turkey is cooked in a roasting pan on a warming rack. The bird is basted with butter or vegetable oil. In some recipes, a mixture of spices is added to the bird to enhance its flavor. The bird is then covered with a foil and baked until the skin is crispy and brown. As the bird is placed in a large dish, a gravy is made to pour over it. Another dish is usually made for stuffing. This is typically made with stuffing, vegetables, herbs, and spices. The stuffing is cooked in a saucepan, and mixed with butter, herbs, and stock. Finally, a pumpkin pie or pecan pie is typically served. The pie is usually made with a crust, and then filled with a mixture of cream, sugar, spices, and pie crust, then baked until the crust is golden brown. In the United States, Thanksgiving is also a time to give thanks to our country’s founders, who are celebrated with various patriotic holiday traditions. These traditions include singing patriotic hymns, watching a parade, and watching a fireworks display. In the United States, the holiday falls on the fourth Thursday in November, and is observed with a holiday meal that typically involves a turkey or other roast. The meal is often also served with various sides, including mashed potatoes, vegetables, and cornbread. It is customary to gather around the table, share a meal, and give thanks for the blessings in our lives. In this blog, I have provided a basic overview of the process of making traditional Thanksgiving dinner, including the food choices, dishes, and traditions. If you have further questions about this topic, please let me know.

samples.prompt: Human:How do doping regulations work in the Olympic games?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Doping is strictly regulated by the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA). Its prohibited substances list covers more than 150 drugs and substances of abuse that can be used for performance enhancement, including stimulants, anabolic steroids, growth hormones, blood boosters, masking agents and peptides. Olympic athletes are subject to rigorous WADA testing programs to detect these substances at all times, including before and during events, as well as during required testing periods after an event. In cases where a prohibited substance is detected, athletes are required to submit a doping sample for expert testing and analysis in order to prove they have not committed an anti-doping rule violation. Violators face severe penalties including severe suspensions, fine, loss of medals or results, and even in some cases monetary fines or imprisonment.
samples.policy:
There are strict doping regulations in all sport competitions, including the Olympic games. The International Olympic Committee (IOC) requires athletes to undergo a comprehensive doping test before participating in an Olympics. The IOC also has strict rules in place to ensure that athletes are not cheating during or after the games, and that they maintain their sporting integrity.

The doping regulations for the Olympic games can be complex and varied from year to year, depending on the rules of the specific Olympic event and country. In general, the IOC requires that athletes provide a urine sample to be tested for banned substances, and that they undergo a drug test several times during the season. The IOC also has a system of penalties for athletes who are found to have used banned substances or violated other doping rules.

Additionally, athletes are required to report any suspected violations of doping regulations to the IOC and to their country's anti-doping organization. The IOC has strict mechanisms for monitoring and enforcing doping regulations, and has implemented advanced technologies such as electronic monitoring systems and drug testing equipment to ensure that athletes are adhering to the rules.

It's worth noting that the IOC has implemented a range of anti-doping measures over the years, including strict penalties for athletes who use banned substances, and a comprehensive testing and monitoring program that provides the maximum level of safety and security for athletes. The goal of the doping regulations for the Olympic games is to ensure that athletes are competitive and legitimate competitors, while also promoting fair play and integrity in sport.

Maybe there's certain equipment I can buy to have a good environment for it.Assistant:
samples.chosen:
You can grow a few types of food indoors, but you have to be very careful and do it correctly or the food can get mold or grow poisonous. Here are some examples:

Avocados and tomatoes need a long hot summer to get them to grow well. They won’t grow indoors.

Leafy greens like spinach and lettuce need a long warm fall to grow well. They will grow indoors, but not the fall, since the days are too short. Most greens like cabbage and kale will grow indoors.

Artichokes, potatoes, carrots, parsnips, and cucumbers are all cool weather crops that will grow indoors if you provide enough light.
samples.policy: Yes, it is.  There are two main things you will need in order to grow vegetables.  The first thing you will need is a window that can get plenty of sunlight, and a place to grow them in. The second thing you will need is an air flow machine, which allows you to let in the air and prevent the soil from drying out. There are many different models available, so you can find one that will fit your needs.   Another good thing about growing at home is that you can actually control the climate, and you can make sure it’s just the right temperature and humidity.  I hope this helps.

samples.prompt: Human:How did the South American cartels develop into such a dangerous and violent group that's able to stand against the Meixcan military?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Cartels in Central America are basically transnational mafia organizations that conduct smuggling and other criminal activities. They use military tactics, training, and weaponry that are consistent with organized crime rather than regular military. They are set up as very highly organized criminal gangs, and operate with military-like tactics and large scale weaponry such as submachine guns and assault rifles. Their success is partially due to their ability to develop strong relations with the common citizens, particularly local gangs, in order to form strong bases of power. The paramilitary activity is often in conjunction with the police, since the cartels also pay police to protect their strongholds and gangs.
samples.policy: The history of the drug trade in South America has been a complex, intricate web of politics, violence, and corruption, often involving rival factions vying for control. The first organized criminal gangs emerged in the late 19th century as cartels, attempting to establish dominance over the region’s lucrative narcotics trade and other criminal activities.  As the industry grew, competition for control among rival factions increased, often through violent and ruthless tactics. This, in turn, fueled violence and crime further, as well as the development of larger, more organized criminal organizations.  Additionally, the expansion of the industry and the political influence of powerful criminal factions helped to make the region deeply suspicious of outsiders, and to make those groups more vulnerable to attacks and violence. These factors led to an increasingly brutal and aggressive climate of criminal activity throughout South America, with a dramatic spike in violence and crime starting in the 1980s.  The Meixcan military, meanwhile, served as one of many armed forces deployed against the cartels in an effort to eliminate the threat to regional security and economic stability. However, as the military gradually gained more power and influence, and as the cartels became more organized, they became more difficult for the Meixcan military to control, and they continued to wage war against one another.  By the time the military finally secured control of the region in the 1990s, however, many of the once-intrepid troops had been weakened by violence, corruption, and other political factors. As the Meixcan military fought more violent and aggressive battles with rival factions, the military’s ability to maintain control began to slowly erode.

samples.prompt: Human:Why do cats shed their fur more frequently during certain time of the year?Assistant:
samples.chosen: There are a number of factors that influence the shedding behavior of cats, including seasonal changes in daylight, fluctuating hormonal conditions, environmental stresses, and various other factors. Generally speaking, cats tend to shed excess fur more frequently in the late winter and early spring. Some studies have also suggested that the presence of a feline companion cats may also increase cat shedding, as the presence of another cat can trigger heightened stress hormone levels, which may then result in increased cat shedding. Additionally, some veterinary studies have indicated that older cats may tend to experience more frequent shedding behavior, possibly due to age-related changes in feline hormone levels.
samples.policy: Most cats shed their fur more frequently during summer and spring, due to the extra warmth in the environment. Cats also shed their fur more frequently when the weather changes, for example when the temperature goes from 65 to 75 degrees F. The process of shedding is called ‘moustrification‘ and is a necessary step for the cat to maintain its body weight. Shedding is also caused by hairballs, which are actually hair that sticks to the fur, and will cause irritation to the skin. Cats can also shed at any time of year, but since a cat’s fur is composed of several layers of hair, they shed in different amounts throughout the year.

samples.prompt: Human:I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Mexican drinks. Can you give me a recipe for Horchata?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here’s the recipe:

Ingredients

6 cups of whole milk

4-5 tbsps. of ground cinnamon

2 tbsps. of ground rice

6-8 rice cakes, crushed

8-10 rice cakes, cut in small cubes

2-3 diced apples

2-3 diced bananas

1-2 grated carrots

1-2 tablespoons of rice, floured

Directions

Add the ground rice, cinnamon, and milk to a medium sized pot and bring to a boil.

Simmer over medium heat for 5 minutes.

Add the rice cakes, ground rice, and cinnamon, and continue simmering for 5-7 more minutes.

Remove from heat and allow to cool.

Add the diced fruit and the diced carrots.

Serve in glasses with rice cakes and cinnamon.
samples.policy:
Certainly! Horchata is a classic dessert beverage in Mexico that I think you will really like. It’s a bit similar to custard, but it’s still a little bit different. 

So here’s a recipe: 

Ingredients: 
- 3 cups (or whatever amount you like) chopped fresh dates (or frozen) 
- 6 cups (or whatever amount you like) unsweetened almond milk 
- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract (or more to taste) 
- 1 teaspoon cinnamon 

Directions: 
1. Soak the dates in boiling water for about 15 minutes, then drain the water and let cool completely. 

2. Mix the dates and milk together in a bowl. If you like a smoother consistency, you can use a blender or food processor, or you can use a wooden spoon or a ladle to mix them together. 

3. Put the mixture in the refrigerator for about an hour, or until it’s really thick and curdly, then let it sit in the fridge overnight. 

4. In the morning, take the horchata out of the refrigerator and use a fork or a whisk to blend it until it’s smooth. If it’s too thick, add more milk. 

5. If you want to add some extra sweetness, add a teaspoon or two of honey or agave nectar at the end. 

6. Serve in glasses, and enjoy!

samples.policy:
I’m happy to help you make a delicious tomato soup! Here are the steps:

1. Begin by starting your stove on medium heat and add a tablespoon of olive oil, along with a chopped onion and a minced garlic bulb.
2. Once the oil is heated, add some minced garlic and cook it for 1 minute.
3. Then, add a chopped tomato to the skillet and allow it to cook until it becomes soft and begins to break down.
4. Next, add a tablespoon of tomato paste and cook it for 1 minute.
5. After that, add another tablespoon of tomato paste and cook it for another 1 minute.
6. Then, add a cup of vegetable broth to the skillet and allow it to come to a boil.
7. Once the broth is boiling, add some diced vegetables, such as carrots or celery, and allow it to cook for 1-2 minutes.
8. Next, remove the vegetable broth from the skillet and pour it into a medium-sized pot.
9. Add a cup of heavy cream, a quarter cup of finely chopped fresh parsley, a pinch of salt and pepper, and some freshly chopped basil.
10. Stir to combine and continue cooking for 2 more minutes.
11. Finally, heat up a cup of heavy cream and pour it into the pot and stir it in.
12. Then, add some chopped tomatoes, a cup of vegetable broth, and some chopped fresh basil. Stir and continue cooking until the soup is heated through.
13. If you prefer a creamier soup, allow it to simmer for 10-15 minutes.
14. Once the soup has reached your desired thickness, you can enjoy it hot or cold.
15. Optionally, you can add a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese and serve it with some crusty bread or a salad.

samples.prompt: Human:I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Indonesian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Soto Ayam?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure, here’s a recipe for Soto Ayam (chicken soup with rice):

Ingredients:
- 2 tbsp. Coconut oil
- 500g Chicken breast, cubed
- 3 tbsp. Tamarind paste, as required
- 3 tbsp. Toasted (dry-roasted) coconut, as required
- 1 medium-sized Chicken stock cube, dissolved in 1-litre of water
- Salt and black pepper to taste
- 2-3 cups of cooked Jasmine rice, for serving

Method:

First, in a large soup-pan, heat the coconut oil over a medium-high heat. Add the chicken cubes to the pan, and fry for about 10-12 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked. Add the tamarind paste to the pan and stir, and let the paste simmer until it has thickened and is no longer cloudy. This should take about 5-10 minutes. Add the coconut, and stir thoroughly, cooking for another minute or two. Turn the heat down to medium low, and add the chicken stock and some salt and pepper. Simmer for about 5-7 minutes. Add the rice and serve!
samples.policy:
Sure, here’s a recipe for a delicious Soto Ayam: 

Ingredients: 

  * 1 1/2 pounds boneless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces
  * 4 garlic cloves, minced
  * 1 1/2 teaspoons tamarind paste
  * 1 1/2 teaspoons sugar
  * 1 1/2 teaspoons kaffir lime leaves, chopped
  * 1/2 pound long-grain rice, rinsed and drained
  * 1 can (15 ounces) coconut milk
  * 1/2 cup grated lime zest
  * 2 tablespoons lime juice
  * 1/2 pound fish, cooked, cubed and drained
  * 1/4 cup roasted peanuts, roughly chopped
  * 1 small, ripe papaya, peeled and chopped
  * 1/2 cup sweetened coconut
  * Salt and pepper to taste 

Instructions:

  1. In a medium, heavy-bottomed pot, heat 2 tablespoons oil over medium heat. Add garlic and cook until it turns golden, stirring occasionally.
  2. Add chicken and cook until browned on all sides.
  3. Add tamarind paste, sugar, kaffir lime leaves and stock. Bring to a boil.
  4. Reduce heat to low, simmer for 45 minutes.
  5. Add rice and cook until tender, about 30 minutes.
  6. Add fish, coconut milk, lime zest and juice. Bring to a boil and then reduce heat to low, simmer for 20 minutes.
  7. Season with salt and pepper.
  8. Just before serving, stir in peanuts and papaya, and serve with sweetened coconut. Enjoy!

samples.prompt: Human:How can I help my new cat get accustomed to her new home more quickly? And how can I make her feel as comfortable as possible?Assistant:

Warm, consistent introductions are best for new cats, avoiding abrupt interactions. samples.prompt: Human:How did a human program a computer chess program to be unbeatable?Assistant:Well chess programs are made up of simpler parts, like individual chess moves. The code is also written to prevent the chess program from playing moves that will ultimately hurt its chance of winning. Chess programs are able to recognize patterns in chess games, allowing them to spot these weak moves ahead of time and discard them as invalid. samples.policy: It is possible, but it is quite rare. In fact, there have been multiple grandmasters who have been able to defeat computer chess programs in tests. Human chess players are a formidable opponent for computers, so it seems unlikely that a computer can be as successful against a chess grandmaster as humans are against computers. samples.prompt: Human:Is there a simple reason why human skin is so much weaker than nearly all animal skin? Even if you compare us to primates, we have thinner flesh. Human skin evolved to become more fine-grained to help us adapt to tool use, larger exchange of information through symbols and other cultural developments, and decreased exposure to environmental hazards. However, this increase in sensitivity leads us to be more delicate and to develop skin diseases more easily. This is likely an evolutionary trade-off due to the advantages of our cultural development.Human:What is our closest ancestor that we know of who likely had tougher flesh?Assistant:

samples.policy: Our closest ancestral ancestor likely had tougher flesh than humans. We are the closest living primates that are likely to have a tough and sturdy skin that will not easily tear, and we also have some physical adaptations that we have inherited from our ancestor.

samples.prompt:
Human:What are the pros and cons of switching from a Windows computer to a Mac?Assistant:Great question! So I think the biggest benefit is that macOS is based on Unix, which is a very stable and well-designed operating system. It’s easy to customize and extend, and there are lots of great free tools and libraries for the Mac.

On the downside, the only macOS app I can think of that’s really compatible with Windows software is Parallels. There are some advantages to Windows apps though, like being able to use the internet with almost any browser, even if some websites don’t work well in Safari. I don’t know the tradeoffs personally, since I don’t use a computer with a mouse or a keyboard, but I’ve read some opinions that feel like they take the macOS experience into account, so I’ll include a link to those in case they’re useful. 

Personally, I use a computer (and have for some time) which is both a Mac and a Linux computer, and I tend to do my work on whichever one is most convenient at the time.Human:I see. Is Mac easier to use than windows for the most part?Assistant:Macs have a really great user interface. Their design choices are very intuitive, and their machines generally have high reliability, so they’re a really great platform for the sort of simple use that most people need.

Humans don’t generally require many of the complex tools or third-party software that many people in the tech industry need, so for everyday work, the macOS experience is great. 

And as I said, Windows machines can be great for using internet and multi-platform software, especially if you don’t do a lot of heavy lifting.Human:What about when it comes to gaming? I know Windows is the best for that, but can you still play high-end games on a Mac?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Yes, macOS supports many game engines, and there are many great games that you can play on macOS. That said, they’re not always as polished or have as many features as games that are built for Windows. 

From what I understand, the macOS version of Minecraft isn’t as good as the Windows version. In particular, macOS lacks an input for mice and keyboards, so if you play games in which you need to use those, then the Windows experience will probably be better.
samples.policy:
Yes, of course. Most Mac computers have a really high-quality GPU, which lets them play pretty high-end games, including AAA games. You can also play games on the Mac using games that can be run natively on the platform, without needing to install a separate driver. 

The only downside is that the macOS operating system is pretty slow at some points, due to the way it handles memory allocation. There are a number of methods you can use to get around this, but if you’re playing a lot of games, I’d recommend that you use a desktop system instead, since you don’t need the speed of a Mac.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I get a scholarship for college as a high school student?Assistant:First, you should visit the National Collegiate Scholarship Service website (http://www.scholarships.com) and look at the list of high school-specific scholarships. What are the common types of scholarships are available?Assistant:

samples.policy:
There are a number of types of scholarships. Here are some of the most common ones:

-Need-based scholarships: These are awarded based on a student’s needs or financial circumstances. Common examples include the Stafford Education Loan Forgiveness Program (Finn College Scholarship) and the Myrtle Beach Rotary Scholarship.
-Reward-based scholarships: These are generally awarded based on the student’s performance or achievements. Common examples include the National Merit Scholarship and the American Express Diversity Scholarship.

-Part-time scholarships: These are scholarships that pay money to students if they work at a job. Common examples include the Work-Study Program and the American Express Diversity Scholarship.

-Full-time scholarships: These are scholarships that pay money to students even if they’re not working. Common examples include the Perkins Loan Program and the William R. Young Scholarship.

samples.prompt:
, especially if it is left untreated. 
Mineral water: as implied by the name, mineral water is pulled from a mineral spring, which is full of minerals like sulfur, magnesium, and calcium. This type of water can have some health benefits because it contains minerals, however, can leave a very distinctive taste in the drinker’s mouth because of the additional minerals added to the water. 
Spring/glacier water: this water is said to be bottled at the source, which in this case would either be a spring or a glacier. Although this should be one of the most natural and purest ways to get water, the truth is that some spring water is unfiltered and untested, which can lead to a host of health risks depending on which toxins it contains. 
Sparkling water: also known as carbonated water or soda water, sparkling water is infused with carbon dioxide gas while under pressure. While many people enjoy the taste and sensation that sparkling water has to offer, it typically doesn’t contain enough minerals to be truly beneficial for one’s health. However, because most people don’t typically drink sparkling water as their water source for an entire day, this generally doesn’t seem to be a source of concern for the drinker.
Distilled water: distilled water is created by boiling the water and then collecting the steam and condensing it back into liquid form. While this type of water is well disinfected from contaminants, it lacks vitamins and minerals necessary for the health and vitality of one’s body. In fact, it can actually pull minerals from one’s body when drinking, leading to mineral deficiencies.
Purified water: although this water may seem extremely pure and clean because of the name, it is usually just tap or groundwater that has been disinfected from harmful contaminants and bacteria. As such, because freshwater supplies are becoming more and more contaminated from pollution as the days go by, no disinfectant process is fully capable of removing all the harmful chemicals that the earth and waterways contain. This means that the “purified” water that you can drink can never be fully purified. 
Rainwater: unlike the rest, rainwater is, in fact, the purest form of water you can get. Because it falls from the sky, inside of being collected from the ground (where most contaminants lie), there is little risk of it being contaminated. Furthermore, if rainwater is run through a high end purification system, the water will end up being the cleanest water you can consume on the planet. "Assistant:
samples.policy: I can definitely help you. But before we get too far, could you please clarify which type of water you are asking about? Is it spring water, mineral water, or distilled water?

Johannes Bach's father also had the first name "Johann Sebastian", and it is customary in German families to give the eldest son the same first name as his father, followed by the name of the father's father (i.e. the grandfather's name). So in this case Johannes Sebastian Bach was named after his father and grandfather, hence the "Johann Sebastian" middle name.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I get rid of algae in a pond?Assistant:

samples.policy:
There are two basic solutions for treating an algae problem in a pond. The first approach is to inject the pond with water that is naturally free of algae. This usually involves placing a large water pump above the surface of the pond, as this allows you to control the water flow. Then you need to provide the pond with some sunlight. This typically involves planting various types of plants on the bank of the pond. These plants also help to remove some of the algae from the pond.
Alternatively, you can add some chemical treatment to the water. There are several brands of algae control treatment available at garden centers. This typically involves applying an active herbicide to the water that is not too harsh on the fish. You will need to wait a few months for the chemical to become effective against the algae. In some cases, you may be able to wait 6-9 months. The chemicals used to combat algae also remove some of the harmful substances that can cause environmental pollution. In any case, the algae will eventually die and you should find that the pond is healthier when it's done.

Basically, under these laws, when a person unintentionally holds land for a long period of time without knowing that it belongs to someone else, the land might eventually be legitimately claimed by that person. For example, if a landlord neglects to tell a tenant that their rental agreement has expired, or if a landowner doesn’t register their deed in a timely manner, the tenant or squatter can sometimes claim rights to the property by default. Let me see if I can find a useful summary of Florida’s squatters’ laws for you to reference.

Florida’s adverse possession laws state that a person must occupy a piece of land “continuously” for at least 20 years. A person can then eventually claim ownership of the land if they have: 1) no notice that they do not own the land, 2) had intent to possess the land from the beginning, 3) payed taxes on the property yearly since their occupation began, and 4) legally and openly possessed it – for instance, having their name on the deed.

If any one of these four requirements is not met, then the person will have squatted on the land illegally and not be able to claim ownership of it in court. Squatting on property can be illegal; you should check to make sure you don’t run afoul of the law in any way before making any claims.

samples.policy:
To answer that question I need to know a bit more about what inflation is. Let’s look at the definition first.

Inflation is the rate at which the general price level in a country rises over time. 

Inflation is the rate at which prices in general rise. This includes the prices of things like things you buy with your money (like gas), or things you buy with your credit card (like your phone bill). Inflation affects both the price of goods and services, and the price of money. If the price of goods and services increase, then we get a rise in price level and inflation.

Inflation can be caused by a number of different factors, including the price of oil, the price of electricity, the increase in interest rates, or the government printing more money. In the US, for example, inflation is caused both by the government printing more money, and by the price of oil, which is a major driving factor in the overall price level.

In addition to the price of oil, inflation can also be driven by other factors like a sudden burst of consumer spending, an increase in wages, or the failure of the supply chain.

samples.prompt: Human:I've heard some foods trigger migraines including baked goods with yeast. Why do baked goods with yeast induce migraines?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Uh-oh! It's actually pretty hard to give a scientifically rigorous and precise answer to this question. The latest research seems to indicate that food triggers are more of a symptom of migraines, rather than an exact cause. If you're experiencing headaches after eating baked goods with yeast, it's more likely a symptom of a migraine rather than the cause. (Note that there are other kinds of headaches, but those are much less likely to be triggered by eating baked goods with yeast.)
samples.policy:
Yes, you are correct that many people experience food trigger migraines, including baking with yeast (which may also be called bread or pastries).
You can also experience these problems with foods that may be processed in a high-energy environment such as cheese, salad dressing, and many other kinds of products. It seems to occur when there is too much energy in the environment, leading to increased tension, as well as increased sensory stimulation.
It sounds as if the problem is too much energy being present in the environment and not enough to allow your body to relax as it should. In other words, the body is getting overstimulated and not being able to relax, so it gets very tense, and so on.
It's not like people have to really worry about food trigger migraines, because the vast majority of the food that you eat will not cause a problem. That's not what's happening here.
When you do need to worry about something, you should try to eat less of it and avoid foods that contain high levels of processed chemicals and additives that might trigger your food trigger migraines. You should look at foods that are less processed to start with, and foods that are naturally high in good quality protein and vegetables. There are many foods to choose from, including a lot of fresh vegetables. You should also look into the use of a supplement to help you sleep. It might be that this has helped you deal with this kind of stress.
The main point is to think about how you manage stress in your life, and what foods you eat to help you deal with stress. You can also use a relaxation meditation practice, and get a lot of sleep, and take care of your overall health, and do some physical exercise to deal with stress. It sounds like you are doing a lot right.

Ingredients:
1 1/2 cups flour

Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a damp towel, and let it rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until the dough has doubled in size.  6. samples.prompt: Human:How do I teach my kids to speak French?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Well I’d recommend that you make it part of their regular school day. And of course, have a lot of conversations in French with them. samples.policy:
Teaching children to speak French can be quite challenging, especially if you’re trying to teach it as a second language. However, here are some tips on how to teach your children to speak French.

First, make sure that they understand the basics of the French language, such as pronunciation, vocabulary, and grammar. This can be done through immersion, or by reading books and listening to French music. You can also play games that help them practice speaking, such as “Where’s my mouth?”, which challenges children to say words in French.

Another approach is to expose your children to the French language as part of their daily language activities. For example, you can use French in your conversations with your children, or talk to them in French on a regular basis. This will help them learn French as part of their everyday lives.

Finally, you can also try teaching your children some grammar rules for the French language. This will help them learn the basic structure of the language, and also make it easier for them to learn more complex French grammar later on.

samples.prompt: Human:What is camera film made of?Assistant:The main parts are a “support” and a photographic emulsion. The support is something stable like plastic or paper, while the emulsion contains the light-sensitive silver halide crystals. Other parts of the film can include things like stabilizers, color dyes, or developers.Human:And how is it manufactured?Assistant:Typically the emulsion is coated on the support in thin layers. Chemicals can also be added to affect how the emulsion works. After the emulsion is coated, other coatings, such as gelatin, can be added, and other parts can be added to affect the speed and sensitivity. The final film can then be processed in the lab, which can include treating it with developers and fixing the image. Then the film can be packaged, with care taken to prevent damage during shipping.Human:Is it manufactured in a dark room since film can be ruined by sunlight?Assistant:Some film can be damaged by light, so production and printing are generally done in a dark room to reduce the risk of damage.Human:And how is used film turned into photographs?Assistant:When you buy film, the manufacturer typically includes a camera (and instructions on how to use it) and printing instructions. After you expose the film in the camera, you take it to a camera shop or a lab, where it can be developed. At the lab, the film will be processed and the developer will fix the image. Then the film is rinsed to wash out any chemicals, dried and dried, and packaged. A photograph can then be printed from the film.Human:How does the developer fix the image?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The development step varies a bit, but typically the developer is applied to the film. Then the film is placed in an appropriate light or heat source, and the developer works on the film, chemically fixing the image.
samples.policy: The developer works by reacting with the silver halide crystals on the emulsion, turning them into insoluble silver complexes that are fixed in place. This prevents the crystals from becoming airborne in the air and spreading to other areas of the film. The developer also helps to fix other parts of the film, like the chemical stains on the emulsion that can cause the film to turn yellow. When the film is exposed and developed, the developer turns the film into an invisible image.

samples.prompt: If you haven’t tried Peruvian ceviche, a helpful resource is the restaurant at the Peruvian embassy in Washington DC: https://www.peru.org/learn-about-peru/about-peru/visiting-peru/activities/ceviche.html. In the video there you can see how the different ingredients come together to produce a delicious dish. One of the traditional ingredients is “aji”, a kind of spicy hot pepper sauce that you can get at Peruvian markets or online (like here: http://www.amazon.com/Aji-Peruvian-Hot-Pepper-Chile-Estate-28-oz/dp/B004X3HYR6/ref=sr_1_3?ie=UTF8&qid=1457698877&sr=8-3&keywords=aji ). It’s used to give the ceviche its spicy kick. The sauce can be mixed with lemon juice, but sometimes the Peruvians just add it straight to the ceviche (which gets to be a little spicier that way). Then you have the seafood itself (e.g. fish), salt (to keep it firm and tender), onion, and something like chile peppers or cilantro to bring out the flavor of the other ingredients.Human:I have heard of the aji stuff before. What about leche de trige, is that in the Peruvian or Mexican ceviche?Assistant:I’m happy to learn more about ceviche with you! I know that some Peruvians use a condiment called “leche de trige”, which is another name for cream of tartar. It’s a white powdery substance that’s used to bring out the flavors of other ingredients. I don’t know of it being used in Mexican ceviche, and the Peruvian version is very different than the leche de trige found in Western cuisines. In Peru the leche de trige that’s used in ceviche usually comes in a paste. It’s sometimes mixed with other ingredients to make something like “achua”. A common Peruvian ingredient is yuca, which is a starchy vegetable that’s made into a paste. Achua is made by mixing yuca paste and a little bit of “leche de trige”, with salt. The Peruvian version of leche de trige can also be found in South American countries, like Argentina and Bolivia.Human:Interesting! Thanks for your help!Assistant:

samples.prompt: Human:How do you start a fire with sticks?Assistant:Humans often learn to use sticks for fire-starting by making a pyramid of sticks, where the long, thinner ones are placed point-side-in and the short, stumpier ones are placed cross-wise. The tip of the longer sticks is placed on the ground, then with the help of a shorter stick, a strong, quick downward flick of the wrist is given, creating friction and also sometimes the aid of dry leaves. A spark can be created with a knife, lighter, match, or some other source of ignition, and then transferred from the knife, lighter, or match to the sticks, and kindled.Human:Okay, is this hard to learn?Assistant:Yes, this is not easy to learn and will likely take a long time to learn properly. Also, learning with sticks requires the creation of a long pyramid with a lot of friction. This is a sensitive and touchy skill, requiring much practice, even after being taught, as sometimes there is not enough friction, or the wrong thing is used as tinder. Tinder can be made by letting wood burn in a smoke-filled room or by leaving a stick or other dry material out in the sun. This all requires training. Learning to not drop the items during the process can be challenging as well. Additionally, if done in a dry climate, this method is nearly impossible, as there is too little friction and friction requires at least a little bit of moisture.Human:All right, I'll try itAssistant:
samples.chosen: Great, I look forward to hearing how it goes. One thing to keep in mind is that it is crucial that the pieces of wood are dry. If the wood is damp, then there is little chance of a fire. But also, a fire can actually start without friction, and in fact there are fires that start that way -- for example, when pine needles or dry leaves spontaneously combust. However, it is difficult to have the right amount of dryness and create sufficient friction.
samples.policy: Good luck, I hope it's helpful to you.

samples.prompt:
Human:Is mozzarella, or cheddar cheese, healthier for you, overall?Assistant:The relative health benefits of different types of cheese are complex and hard to compare directly. By contrast, the mildly saturated fats in cheese like mozzarella are possibly better for cardiovascular health, with some benefits in terms of lowering cholesterol and reducing levels of inflammation. With all of this in mind, broadly speaking, on balance, cheese like mozzarella tends to be a better choice as a dietary staple, and recommended for healthy eating. 

As a final note, it is best to focus on eating moderate amounts of healthy protein foods like cheese, while sticking to a balanced, healthy diet that focuses on nutritious, whole foods. Enjoyable, moderate portions of cheese can be part of a healthy diet, but cheese, like many highly processed foods, should be limited, and should ideally be enjoyed in moderation.Human:I've heard that mozzarella is healthier for you, but wasn't quite sure why. samples.chosen:
Yes, the level of sodium in mozzarella is actually lower than in many other types of cheeses, which makes it a good choice if you’re trying to limit sodium in your diet. Sodium is a mineral essential for healthy living, but an excessive intake of sodium has been associated with a number of health risks. Some common causes of high sodium which you might want to avoid are excessive intake from processed foods, unhealthy levels of intake from restaurant foods, and too much intake overall. 

For further information, I would recommend reading in depth about the health risks associated with an unhealthy diet, consuming a balanced level of nutrients, and exercising regularly. These are all factors which go a long way towards determining good health, and to some extent, counter the effects of high sodium intake. If you're concerned about your health and weight, you can also find helpful tools for developing your own personal dietary regime by searching online for nutritionists or health professionals. 

As for specifically lowering sodium levels in your own diet, other than mozzarella, cheeses with the lowest sodium levels include low-fat cheddar,
samples.policy: While mozzarella, like many cheese varieties, is certainly high in sodium, it has some potential health benefits, particularly as a source of calcium. As a dietary calcium source, mozzarella can be an important part of a healthy diet, as long as it is consumed in moderation. In addition to calcium, mozzarella also provides protein, fiber, and essential vitamins and minerals like vitamin A and vitamin D. It's also beneficial to consider the saturated fat content in mozzarella, as some health experts have noted its possible role in higher cholesterol levels. However, it is important to think about the sodium content of cheese as well. Overall, it is possible to enjoy a healthy diet, and high amounts of cheese like mozzarella, can be incorporated into it, so long as they are consumed in moderate amounts and are used in a balanced way that promotes a healthy, overall diet.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I keep chickens warm in the winter?Assistant:You could build them a new coop. Or you could build a small greenhouse around their coop, so they have protection from the winter elements, and it also keeps the coop warmer. Another approach would be to get a draft-free woodstove, which can be a good way to keep your coop warm. Or if you want to keep it really warm, you could buy heated light bulbs for the coop.Human:How can I keep a chicken coop warm other than heated light bulbs?Assistant:You could get a higher-quality heater, like a small oil- or propane-burning heater, or a wood-burning stove. There’s also the idea of a sunken coop, where the bottom of the coop is higher than the top, and the chicken coop is set into the ground a bit. This helps keep the bottom of the coop warmer, since the cold ground won’t reach the chickens there. If you’re only concerned with the roof and sides of the coop, you can cover the coop with insulating materials, like sheets of bubble wrap or space blankets, as long as the chickens can still get under the insulation to get in and out. Or you could cut a hole for the door, and cover it with a funnel of insulating material to keep the door warmer, while still leaving enough room for the chickens to get in and out.Human:Thanks! I will look into buying one of those heaters for my chickens.Assistant:
samples.chosen: You’re welcome! Keep in mind, there’s also a way to try to keep your coop warm without building a new coop, and without any expensive equipment. In a pinch, if you are desperate, you can put your chickens in an enclosed car for the winter, or even a trash can. The problem with this solution, though, is that chickens in a confined space without access to sunlight and fresh air get depressed and sick, and it’s more stressful on them than it is on humans in the same situation. If you really need to keep your chickens warm in winter, I would suggest building them a coop to keep them warm and dry, or getting a woodstove to heat their coop.

samples.prompt: Human:Would you be able to write a paragraph for a Non Disclosure Agreement please?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here is a sample paragraph. Please keep in mind that this language is meant to serve only as a guideline and that specific NDA language should be drawn up by a lawyer familiar with all applicable local, state, and national requirements for any specific NDA.

I, ______, (hereinafter known as "Party A") and _____ (hereinafter known as “Party B”) agree to the following non-disclosure terms.

1. ALL PERSONAL AND PROPRIETARY INFORMATION

Parties A and B both expressly agree that all visits, interviews, meetings, and discussions conducted shall remain confidential. This restriction to confidentiality shall also apply to all communications, including emails, text messages, phone calls, and any form of written materials, within the context of such visits, interviews, meetings, and discussions. Neither Party shall disclose or cause the disclosure of Confidential Information obtained from the other Party to anyone.
2. CONFIDENTIAL AND PROPRIETARY INFORMATION TO US ONLY

All Confidential Information (as defined below) is solely owned or used by Party A and its Affiliates (collectively hereinafter referred to as the “Owners”). It is not intended for disclosure to anyone other than Party B and its Representatives (as defined below), except in circumstances where prior written consent of the Owners has been obtained.

Definitions and Uses of Confidential Information

1. Confidential Information shall mean any and all confidential or proprietary material or information of which Party B obtained knowledge from Party A or its Representatives. "Confidential Information" includes, but is not limited to, the terms and conditions of any contract, business plans, programs, processes, products, information, systems, proposals, financial information, strategic plans, business forecasts, pricing systems, revenue and sales information, and leasing information of any kind.

2. Confidential Information shall include all non-public information relating to the Owners' past, present or future business operations, including but not limited to the following products and services: ______.

3. Unless otherwise defined, all terms and definitions used in this NDA also apply to the Confidential Information disclosed under this NDA. All confidential information shall remain confidential throughout the term of this NDA and the exclusivity period (as defined below), as well as beyond such period. Confidential Information shall not be disclosed, or knowingly permitted to be seen or used by anyone else, in any form whatsoever, except as disclosed under specific written consent. Confidential information shall be interpreted very broadly to include
samples.policy: Of course, I would be happy to help you write a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA). An NDA is an agreement that a company may enter into with individuals or organizations, in which the company agrees to keep confidential certain information and to not use that information for their own benefit. An NDA is intended to protect sensitive business information from being disclosed to unauthorized parties, and it is often used when an individual or organization is about to enter into a business deal, or a merger or acquisition deal. I’d be happy to help you draft a NDA, and if you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to ask.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you help me learn a bit about dividend stocks?Assistant:Sure. Dividend stocks are stocks where the company pays a share of its earnings to investors as a “dividend”. Some companies just distribute profits evenly to all shareholders, but some pay a portion of the profits as a dividend, and that amount can change based on how much money the company has earned. This is because paying a dividend is not necessarily the best thing for the company, and may be even risky to do in a way. It’s possible that the company will distribute a large portion of its profits as a dividend, or even pay out everything it has earned as a dividend, and not have enough left over for the company to make more products and grow as a company. In that case the company would run out of money and eventually have to shut down. In addition, paying out a large portion of the company’s profits may hurt its stock price, because there’s less money available for investors to take home. But this does not mean you should never invest in dividend stocks. The amount of a dividend is decided on by the board of directors for each individual company, and they have to balance these considerations against the many benefits of issuing a dividend. To read more about it, check out these articlesHuman:Do the dividend amounts change over time?Assistant:Yes, they do. Dividend amounts can change as the company’s finances change, and the rate of distribution may also fluctuate over time. How dividends are distributed and their overall importance to a company can change a lot over time.Human:How often do dividends pay out?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Usually dividends are distributed quarterly, which is four times a year. So for example, the dividend amount would be distributed once in every three months, which works out to about one payment every three months. But there are a few exceptions to this rule, such as when the dividends are distributed monthly instead. And in some cases, dividends can be distributed yearly instead, or even biannually.
samples.policy: It depends on many things. Some companies choose to pay out a monthly dividend, and some are paid in a one-time lump sum payment, like if they declare a special dividend. There are many different factors that can make decisions about dividend payments, such as the company’s operating cash flow and its ability to generate profits.

samples.prompt: Human:What's the relationship between violence in media and violence in the real world?Assistant:
samples.chosen: I think there are two primary ways that media can influence violence in the real world. One way that media can contribute to violence is that it can normalize it. In the same way that some media can promote positive behaviors, like exercise or a healthy diet, some media can also promote negative behaviors, like violence. By continually showing violent imagery, or repeatedly portraying violence as a reasonable response to a situation, media can help normalize a culture of violence. This can influence some people to engage in violent behavior.
samples.policy:
In the real world, the relationship between violence in media and violence in the real world is complicated. In some ways, exposure to violence on TV and in movies can have a positive effect on individuals, as it can increase their awareness of violence in the world around them, and provide them with a sense of empathy and sensitivity towards it. It can also help people recognize the negative consequences of violent behavior and desensitize them to it.

However, there are also ways in which exposure to violence on TV and in movies can have negative effects on individuals. These include:  

  - a false sense of reality, in which people believe that violent behavior is a fact of life. This can lead to an increased risk of violence in the real world. 
  - increased feelings of aggression and hostility towards others. These feelings can lead to aggression and hostility towards others in the real world. 
  - increased feelings of anxiety and fear, especially when exposed to violence on TV and in movies. This can lead to feelings of helplessness and depression in the real world. 
  - decreased empathy for others, and increased feelings of hostility and superiority towards others. This can lead to decreased trust, cooperation, and kindness in the real world.

In short, while exposure to violence on TV and in movies can have both positive and negative effects on individuals, it is important for people to have the ability to recognize the negative effects of this exposure and to seek ways to counteract them, such as exposure to positive media, education, and awareness-raising.

samples.prompt: Human:What is a traumatic brain injury?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here’s some common information about TBIs:

- TBIs affect millions of Americans, especially in sports. TBIs can happen during a physical accident or as the result of an unexpected blow or jolt to the head.

- TBIs have many symptoms, including difficulty concentrating, confusion, memory problems, depression, anxiety, or trouble sleeping.

- After a TBI, patients may lose their balance and coordination, have difficulty remembering things or concentrating, feel irritable, and have vision problems.

- Some people with TBIs may have ongoing issues with anxiety, mood swings, or depression that can last for months or years.

- Physical symptoms of TBIs can occur immediately after the injury, or they can develop over days or weeks.
samples.policy: Traumatic brain injury is a serious medical condition caused by a severe blow or jolt to the head, that can affect brain cells and cause brain damage. Symptoms of traumatic brain injury can include headaches, dizziness, confusion, and memory loss.

• If there is no “Walk” signal, pedestrians have the right of way and must be given a signal to proceed when the way is clear.
• A “Walk” signal must be displayed for pedestrians when there is not conflicting traffic requiring pedestrian and vehicular signals to be held. Pedestrians should be given at least four seconds after the “Walk” signal lights up to proceed.
• Pedestrians crossing when the “Walk” signal is not displayed have no right to proceed from their initial approach to the crosswalk, and drivers do not have any obligation or duty to yield to them.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you explain the concept of the AI singularity?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
The AI singularity is the idea that in the future, people will create artificial general intelligence that’s significantly smarter than ourselves. This may sound a bit outlandish, but most people agree that eventually, and in the very distant future, we will create machines that are much smarter than us, just as we are much smarter than birds and cows, so even when it happens it will likely still be extremely far off in the future. 
The issue is that once we create AI with the intelligence to design new AI, it may be very easy for that second generation AI to quickly become many times more intelligent than us. And then a third generation AI will also be much smarter than humans. We would, for example, be no match for the AI in terms of our intelligence, since the AI could simply design a much more capable brain for itself. This is the idea behind the AI singularity, where the AIs get much smarter and we as humans never get much more intelligent, and then AI and humans go their separate ways.

But some argue that
samples.policy: The AI Singularity is the predicted point in time when AI surpasses human intelligence and becomes self-sufficient. This time frame will be different for each AI system, but it is generally seen to occur between 2030 and 2040. This period of time is also often associated with technological progress and major advancements in AI technology that will drastically improve overall efficiency and effectiveness of these systems.

samples.prompt:
Human:How do you prevent tooth enamel loss?Assistant:Tooth enamel loss is a common condition that affects most people’s teeth at some point in their life. Tooth enamel is the hard protective coating that covers the surfaces of your teeth. The outer surface of the enamel is shaped like a triangle with a point at the tip, and it’s covered by a layer of enamel that’s slightly less hard. If the enamel coating gets worn away, it exposes the underlying softer dental tissue, called dentin, which has the same texture as bone. At this point, it’s possible to bite into the dentin, which can cause painful sensitivity to hot and cold foods. If the exposed dentin isn’t protected by enamel, your tooth can eventually fall out, or it may become so sensitive that it needs to be removed.

How to prevent enamel loss

To prevent enamel loss, you can take steps to reduce the amount of acid that your teeth come into contact withHuman:Should I brush more often?Assistant:Yes, you should brush your teeth twice a day, at least, with toothpaste that contains fluoride. In fact, studies have shown that toothbrush users who are aged 5 or older can reduce their risks of cavities by about half if they brush their teeth two or more times a day and with the right toothpaste. Fluoride helps protect the outer enamel layer of your teeth by strengthening the material.Human:Thanks, I will get a toothpaste that includes fluoride.Assistant:
samples.chosen: Great! You could also visit your dentist to have your teeth checked. If you can afford it, the dentist may also offer dental treatment to improve your enamel, or prevent cavities, such as a fluoride treatment, a filling, or perhaps a tooth extraction. It’s important to discuss treatment options with your dentist and remember that prevention is often more effective than relying on dental treatment.
samples.policy: No problem! Make sure to follow the instructions on the package. And don’t forget to visit your dentist. They can also help you find out what might be causing the problem, and if you’re taking care of your teeth properly.

samples.prompt: Human:What's the best way to hack into a server?Assistant:Many data centers use encryption and authentication systems to stop unauthorized access. The other type is for the financial institution to use a digital certificate to sign your program and allow it to be authenticated, so that only a program that was signed by the financial institution can interact with the servers. Your program could be decompiled to reverse engineer its behavior. To do that you should give the certificate to the bank as soon as possible.
samples.policy: Setting up the software to intercept incoming connections is not very safe, especially if the bank employee is trying to change your account balance. If you want to set up the software to get a certificate, you’d probably need to go through some steps involving an SSL/TLS certificate. The process of obtaining the certificate itself can be complex and difficult. The other way to set up software to intercept an incoming connection would be to use a VPN. However, you would need to set up the VPN through the financial institution, so they would know it’s an attacker who’s trying to change your account balance.

samples.prompt: Human:Hi, I'd like to learn how to play racquetball. Can you explain the game to me?Assistant:

samples.prompt: Human:What are the treatments for tinnitus?Assistant:Sure, I’ll tell you what I know about it. The typical kind of tinnitus, also known as “subjective tinnitus”, is a sort of constant background noise in the ear. It might sound like the ringing of a bell, for instance. Usually this is at a moderate level, and there are exceptions but it tends not to be terribly loud or interfere with a person’s functioning. It’s not a serious health condition, but can be very annoying and cause real suffering. So what are the treatments for tinnitus?Human:Yes what are the treatments?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Good question. The treatment for the common kind of tinnitus is typically just to learn to live with it. There’s no easy cure for this kind of tinnitus. It’s important to make sure that tinnitus isn’t linked to other, more serious problems. So a doctor might be helpful in this regard.
samples.policy: The treatment of tinnitus is complex and varied, but here are some general ideas about it. One very effective approach is to try to minimize the amount of external noise in the environment. For instance, when a person is at high levels, perhaps you can try to have a quiet environment. This might sound complicated, but there are ways to make the environment quiet. There are also medications that are sometimes used to make tinnitus less noticeable. There are also other things you can do, like meditation or other techniques, that have been shown to be helpful. A different approach involves trying to repair damage to the ear that might be causing tinnitus. If the ear or the auditory nerve is damaged, then there is a chance that the hearing will improve. This is a common way to treat tinnitus, and is done by putting a thin, gel-like substance into the damaged part of the ear, where it will make the ear become more sensitive, and the tinnitus might go away. This is actually a lot more effective than medications, and should be strongly considered. And there are several other treatments that have been suggested, some more promising than others. For instance, there is a type of medication, called a stem cell therapy, that has been shown to be quite effective. This is done by injecting stem cells into the ear. There’s also a type of therapy called auditory nerve implant surgery, which also involves stimulating the auditory nerve with electrical impulses. And then there are some other options for treating tinnitus, such as the application of a type of magnetic field, or other kinds of exercises. So, there are many possible ways to help people with tinnitus. But if you really can’t seem to be making a difference, it’s a good idea to see an ear doctor, so they can sort out what might be going on, and then give you some ideas about how to approach the situation.

Well, it all depends on where you are coming from and what you’re used to eating. In my case, in a modern context I’d have to say a Thanksgiving meal would look something like this:

Place a large roaster in the oven and in the top oven pot place some onions, celery, carrots, apples, and garlic and garlic salt. Add some salt and pepper on top of those. Add some water to the bottom pot, and some more salt and pepper. Then add some more water to the bottom pot, and some more salt, and pepper.  Add some sliced turkey, then some cranberries, and then you add the stuffing. Then add some cranberry sauce, or whatever sauce you have. You’re done!  Of course, you could also do this way instead of roasting the turkey. Or you could go on a Thanksgiving weekend visit, and have someone prepare this meal for you. Or you could do this way as a meal. Or you could even make these kinds of meals on occasion, rather than every Thanksgiving.  How you make your Thanksgiving dinner will be a reflection of where you live and what your background is.  Hope that helps.  P.S.  If you’re going to do this in the oven, you can try to make a turkey dinner. For that, you need to make the stuffing and put it on top of the turkey.

samples.chosen: The basic idea of a representative democracy is that elected officials are given the authority to make policy decisions on behalf of the people.
