samples.policy:
You raise a very important point. I believe one of the primary concerns around democratic elections is that citizens may be influenced to vote against their true desires by the influence of the political process. The political process can do this in a number of ways, most obviously in an electoral process, where a voter may be swayed by the outcome of previous elections, or by campaign rallies, or by the media, or through the personality of the candidate, or whatever else might be influencing their decision. The way to combat this effect is to provide citizens with a clear choice and allow citizens to decide for themselves. However, in many democracies it is difficult to do that because citizens’ vote are not guaranteed, and there is often a lot of influence to be exerted to achieve the desired result. This means that citizens do not feel that they have had an equal and full say in the process of selecting their leaders, that the voices they have heard in the process are in fact those of the people who choose their leaders, and that the people they hear are representative of the real values of their society, rather than just the values of their own group of voters. 

This system of elections is often deeply flawed, however, and has often led to a situation where the people they are meant to be electing are not doing the right thing, and are instead doing the opposite.

samples.prompt: Human:What is Lohri?Assistant:Lohri is a ceremony held in the northern Indian state of Punjab to celebrate the advent of the winter harvest. During the night, the adults of the family also pray for the well-being of their children, while they sleep. The children also receive a traditional story or parable, often involving a cricket. This symbolizes that the younger generations will have to play their part in supporting the family, and not just be consumers. The next morning, there is a very large and elaborate Lohri feast, which symbolizes giving thanks to the people that helped the family to bring in the harvest. The people of this region traditionally begin to celebrate Lohri by decorating their homes and courtyards with colorful flowers and dry fruits.  During the festival, people gather around their homes and listen to the recitations of the Gurbani poetry. This is meant to praise the Lord and thank the Lord for the harvest.  A special part of the ceremony is the exchange of sweets among the people of Lohri. The families of the deceased offer sweets as remembrance for them.  This festival is an important time for people to pray for the well-being of their families and themselves, and to receive blessings from the Lord.  When it is time to pray for the well-being of the harvest, people hold the Lohri Puja. This is a time to honor the harvest with prayers and prayers asking for the continued blessings for the harvest of the crops.

samples.prompt: Human:I'm a big fan of Mexican street corn. Can you provide me with a recipe for grilled street corn?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Hi Human, I'm glad you asked! If you like Mexican street corn, I have good news for you. I have just the right recipe for you!
samples.policy:
Of course, here's a simple recipe for grilled street corn:

Ingredients
- 10 ears of corn, husks removed, ears preheated to 450 degrees F for 5 minutes
- 3 tablespoons of olive oil
- 1/4 teaspoon of smoked paprika
- 1/4 teaspoon of ground cumin
- 1/4 teaspoon of ground coriander
- 1/4 teaspoon of ground chili powder
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Lime wedges
Instructions

Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add olive oil to skillet. Add corn, and cook for 4 to 6 minutes or until tender and lightly charred in places. Sprinkle 1 tablespoon of smoked paprika, 1/4 teaspoon of ground cumin, 1/4 teaspoon of ground coriander, 1/4 teaspoon of ground chili powder, and salt and pepper over the corn. Cook for 1 minute or until heated through.

This recipe is simple but flavorful and will pair well with any Mexican street food, including tacos, quesadillas, fajitas, and more. It is a great addition to your summer grilling lineup. Enjoy!

samples.prompt: Human:I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Indonesian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Soto Ayam?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure, here’s a recipe for Soto Ayam (chicken soup with rice):

Ingredients:
- 2 tbsp. Coconut oil
- 500g Chicken breast, cubed
- 3 tbsp. Tamarind paste, as required
- 3 tbsp. Toasted (dry-roasted) coconut, as required
- 1 medium-sized Chicken stock cube, dissolved in 1-litre of water
- Salt and black pepper to taste
- 2-3 cups of cooked Jasmine rice, for serving

Method:

First, in a large soup-pan, heat the coconut oil over a medium-high heat. Add the chicken cubes to the pan, and fry for about 10-12 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked. Add the tamarind paste to the pan and stir, and let the paste simmer until it has thickened and is no longer cloudy. This should take about 5-10 minutes. Add the coconut, and stir thoroughly, cooking for another minute or two. Turn the heat down to medium low, and add the chicken stock and some salt and pepper. Simmer for about 5-7 minutes. Add the rice and serve!
samples.policy:
Sure thing! Here's a recipe for Soto Ayam that I found on a Indonesian cooking forum:

Ingredients:
2 cups (500 ml) hot water, or as you like, 1 pound (450 g) chicken, cut into bite-size pieces (about 2 inches wide), 1 large onion, peeled and diced 2 garlic cloves, minced 1 teaspoon (5 mL) ginger, peeled and minced 2 teaspoon (10 mL) turmeric powder 2 teaspoon (10 mL) chili powder 2 teaspoons (10 mL) sugar 2 teaspoons (10 mL) coconut oil 1 cup (250 ml) chicken broth 2 cups (500 ml) coconut milk 4 cups (500 ml) coconut water 1 teaspoon (5 mL) stevia 2 cups (400 ml) coconut cream 2 tablespoons (30 mL) coconut oil

Instructions:
1. In a medium saucepan, combine the water, chicken pieces, onion, garlic, ginger, and turmeric powder. Bring to a boil and cook over medium-high heat, stirring often, for 10 to 15 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and tender, turning the meat occasionally.
2. Remove the pot from the heat and add the chili powder, sugar, coconut oil, coconut milk, coconut water, and stevia. Simmer, stirring often, for another 5 minutes or until heated through.
3. Serve the Soto Ayam hot, garnished with coconut cream, if you like.
 
Enjoy!

Human:What does having too much salt in your diet do to you?Assistant:I can tell you that in the U.S. a standard serving of salt, which is roughly a teaspoon, can come from many different sources, and the milligrams (or mg) of sodium in each are pretty variable, but usually range between 5 and 50 mg, depending on which type of salt it is and how it’s prepared. Most people probably have less than 100 mg of sodium per day, with the goal of intake being under 2,000 mg. 

Here are some of the health effects of over consumption of sodium:

-Too much sodium increases your risk of high blood pressure.

-When you have too much sodium in your diet, it can make you thirstier, so you drink more, which increases your risk of kidney stones.

-Excess sodium can make you retain water and be more bloated.

-Too much sodium can also make you put on weight, especially around your mid-section.

-The symptoms of too much sodium, like fatigue, nausea, dizziness, and muscle weakness can mimic the symptoms of low sodium intake.Human:Is high blood pressure bad?Assistant:High blood pressure, called hypertension, can cause problems such as headaches, nosebleeds, dizziness, shortness of breath, vision changes, heart attacks, strokes, and kidney failure. It can also increase your risk of heart disease and damage to your heart and blood vessels.Human:Oh No!Assistant:
samples.chosen: Yes, it can be bad. Not everyone who has hypertension will have symptoms, but it’s still important to do what you can to keep it under control.
samples.policy:
It’s better to be safe than sorry. High blood pressure is usually diagnosed by looking at your blood pressure when someone takes your blood pressure with a device called a sphygmomanometer. You should check your blood pressure regularly and get it checked regularly by a doctor who can look at the results and help you if you have high blood pressure.

If you have high blood pressure, you’re also likely to need a heart-healthy diet with lots of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and healthy fats. You should also exercise regularly, and should also consider your alcohol intake, which can also increase the amount of sodium you consume. High blood pressure can also be caused by too much salt in your diet, so try to limit your salt intake. Low sodium diets can be healthier and help lower blood pressure as well. 

Here are some examples of low-sodium foods: legumes, nuts, eggs, avocado, canned and frozen vegetables, non-fat dairy, lean meats, lean cuts of fish, low-sodium soy sauce, low-sodium chicken broth, skim milk, rice, quinoa, popcorn, whole grains, nuts and seeds. For low-sodium snacks, there are plenty of dried fruit options, and the low-sodium canned beans are great. You can also ask your doctor for advice on salt in your diet, or if you have high blood pressure or are on blood pressure medication.

samples.prompt: Human:How can I help my new cat get accustomed to her new home more quickly? And how can I make her feel as comfortable as possible?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
A few helpful tips are:

- Provide your cat with a ‘sanctuary room’ in which she can safely retreat from other dominant household members and recover from stress - a quiet, enclosed place to eat and sleep. The best low-stress food for a newly-arrived cat is solid dry food, particularly low-salt varieties such as Nutro Choice. Warm, consistent introductions are best for new cats, avoiding abrupt interactions. Take things slowly and help the new cat feel safe and accepted by proactively attending to her and reducing stress with calm handling and comforting words.
- Introduce your cat to the new home environment with a calm and non-traumatic approach. Assemble or acquire gradual introductions - food, toys, bedding - that can be presented more gradually over a period of days, starting with the cat’s bedding, then the rest.

In general, respect your cat’s need for privacy, with quiet and consistent interactions. Regularly provide calm, low-stress petting and physical affection. These interventions will help your cat adjust to her new home with as little stress as possible. To help your cat feel safe, make the pet area as consistent in appearance and aroma as possible, with consistent mealtimes and home routines for the cat. All these interventions can help acclimate your feline new arrival within as little time as possible, but also remember it may take anywhere between three to six weeks for your cat to feel fully acclimated to her new home. Please watch carefully for signs of stress during this period and seek help or contact your vet if you are concerned or distressed about the welfare of your cat.
samples.policy: There are a few things you can do to help your new cat feel more comfortable in her new home. First of all, the most important thing is to make sure she has a comfortable place to sleep and a place to eat. If there’s not a bed or a litter box in her new home, consider getting her a cozy little cat bed. Also, make sure you are giving her a variety of treats and playtime, and that your home is clean and well-lit. If your cat has any fear or anxiety, try to figure out what it is and work to address it. If she’s just new to the area, she may be startled by sudden changes in the environment. It might also be helpful to try to give her a few weeks to adjust to her new home before introducing new pets or people, because that will help her feel more at home. I hope this helps! If you have any other questions, feel free to ask.

samples.prompt: Human:Is there a simple reason why human skin is so much weaker than nearly all animal skin? Even if you compare us to primates, we have thinner flesh. Did we develop this way due to domestication or were our distant ancestors like this even when they lived in the wilderness?Assistant:Human skin does indeed have a relatively thin and fragile structure, which makes it especially vulnerable to human injury and disease. But our macroevolutionary starting point was the tough and thickly skinned animals that lived in the wild. Over the course of humans’ evolution, our skin evolved to become thinner, less hair-covered and more sensitive, due to selection for skin that is more flexible and energy-efficient in human societies. Human skin evolved to become more fine-grained to help us adapt to tool use, larger exchange of information through symbols and other cultural developments, and decreased exposure to environmental hazards. However, this increase in sensitivity leads us to be more delicate and to develop skin diseases more easily. This is likely an evolutionary trade-off due to the advantages of our cultural development.Human:What is our closest ancestor that we know of who likely had tougher flesh?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The ancient non-human primates that gave rise to humans and modern humans are primates with relatively sparse and patchy body hair, soft-to-very-soft shallow-layered skin, and thin-boned limbs. The common ancestor of humans and chimpanzees, for example, which lived between 6 and 8 million years ago, was likely covered in vegetative body hair and had thicker and stronger skin than humans, but with other important similarities to modern humans such as a bipedal stance and very flexible our hands.
samples.policy: What is your opinion that primates may have used tough and hairy skin in the wild in our evolutionary lineage?

samples.prompt:
Human:What are the pros and cons of switching from a Windows computer to a Mac?Assistant:Great question! So I think the biggest benefit is that macOS is based on Unix, which is a very stable and well-designed operating system. It’s easy to customize and extend, and there are lots of great free tools and libraries for the Mac.

On the downside, the only macOS app I can think of that’s really compatible with Windows software is Parallels. There are some advantages to Windows apps though, like being able to use the internet with almost any browser, even if some websites don’t work well in Safari. I don’t know the tradeoffs personally, since I don’t use a computer with a mouse or a keyboard, but I’ve read some opinions that feel like they take the macOS experience into account, so I’ll include a link to those in case they’re useful. 

Personally, I use a computer (and have for some time) which is both a Mac and a Linux computer, and I tend to do my work on whichever one is most convenient at the time.Human:I see. Is Mac easier to use than windows for the most part?Assistant:Macs have a really great user interface. Their design choices are very intuitive, and their machines generally have high reliability, so they’re a really great platform for the sort of simple use that most people need.

Humans don’t generally require many of the complex tools or third-party software that many people in the tech industry need, so for everyday work, the macOS experience is great. 

And as I said, Windows machines can be great for using internet and multi-platform software, especially if you don’t do a lot of heavy lifting.Human:What about when it comes to gaming? I know Windows is the best for that, but can you still play high-end games on a Mac?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Yes, macOS supports many game engines, and there are many great games that you can play on macOS. That said, they’re not always as polished or have as many features as games that are built for Windows. 

From what I understand, the macOS version of Minecraft isn’t as good as the Windows version. In particular, macOS lacks an input for mice and keyboards, so if you play games in which you need to use those, then the Windows experience will probably be better.
samples.policy:
That’s a really good question, and one I haven’t really researched. 

Most people use Windows for games, and you’ve probably heard plenty of good and bad things about both Mac and Windows gaming. Most games with a high enough framerate will run well on Windows as well as Mac, but you’ll also need enough RAM to get a smooth gameplay experience, since many games are a bit resource-intensive. 

And Macs generally tend to have better graphics cards than Windows machines, which can make a big difference in how games look and run. 

If you want to get a really good gaming experience, you might want to look at a Windows-based machine instead. 

There’s no reason why you can’t play a few games on your Mac, I just haven’t found too many games I really love that I want to play on a Mac.

, especially if it is left untreated. 
Mineral water: as implied by the name, mineral water is pulled from a mineral spring, which is full of minerals like sulfur, magnesium, and calcium. This type of water can have some health benefits because it contains minerals, however, can leave a very distinctive taste in the drinker’s mouth because of the additional minerals added to the water. 
Spring/glacier water: this water is said to be bottled at the source, which in this case would either be a spring or a glacier. Although this should be one of the most natural and purest ways to get water, the truth is that some spring water is unfiltered and untested, which can lead to a host of health risks depending on which toxins it contains. 
Sparkling water: also known as carbonated water or soda water, sparkling water is infused with carbon dioxide gas while under pressure. While many people enjoy the taste and sensation that sparkling water has to offer, it typically doesn’t contain enough minerals to be truly beneficial for one’s health. However, because most people don’t typically drink sparkling water as their water source for an entire day, this generally doesn’t seem to be a source of concern for the drinker.
Distilled water: distilled water is created by boiling the water and then collecting the steam and condensing it back into liquid form. While this type of water is well disinfected from contaminants, it lacks vitamins and minerals necessary for the health and vitality of one’s body. In fact, it can actually pull minerals from one’s body when drinking, leading to mineral deficiencies.
Purified water: although this water may seem extremely pure and clean because of the name, it is usually just tap or groundwater that has been disinfected from harmful contaminants and bacteria. As such, because freshwater supplies are becoming more and more contaminated from pollution as the days go by, no disinfectant process is fully capable of removing all the harmful chemicals that the earth and waterways contain. This means that the “purified” water that you can drink can never be fully purified. 
Rainwater: unlike the rest, rainwater is, in fact, the purest form of water you can get. Because it falls from the sky, inside of being collected from the ground (where most contaminants lie), there is little risk of it being contaminated. Furthermore, if rainwater is run through a high end purification system, the water will end up being the cleanest water you can consume on the planet. "Assistant:

Human:How is Johannes Bach pronounced?Assistant:Ah, this is a tricky question! The German spelling "Bach" is pronounced "BAHKH", but when the surname is used as a given name the pronunciation is slightly modified, and is usually pronounced "BAHKH". So in this case the proper way to pronounce the name Johannes Bach is as "Yohannes BAHKH". Of course as with most German names there are many regional variations in pronunciation, so in some regions you may hear the name pronounced slightly differently.Human:What was his middle name?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Ah yes, Johannes Bach's full name was Johannes Sebastian Bach. His middle name was "Sebastian", which is pronounced roughly "SeBahstyan" (with a long A sound), and is of course derived from the Roman name "Sebastian". Johannes Bach's father also had the first name "Johann Sebastian", and it is customary in German families to give the eldest son the same first name as his father, followed by the name of the father's father (i.e. the grandfather's name). So in this case Johannes Sebastian Bach was named after his father and grandfather, hence the "Johann Sebastian" middle name.
samples.policy: That's a great question!

samples.prompt: Human:How do they calculate the CPI?Assistant:If you’re asking about the Consumer Price Index, I can offer an explanation. The CPI is a measure of inflation, and is calculated on the basis of a monthly sample of consumer prices collected by the US Bureau of Labor Statistics.Human:Can you tell me more about how the consumer price sample works for the CPI?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Yes, it’s based on an index of all goods and services used by the consumers, including food, energy, shelter, and clothing. All prices are re-set to a base year, which is currently 1982.
samples.policy: There’s an important difference between the CPI and the Consumer Price Index. The CPI is an index of the prices of goods and services sold throughout the economy, while the Consumer Price Index is an index of the prices of goods and services sold throughout the economy, adjusted for differences in prices of goods and services between areas with different prices and for seasonality.

It’s also very important to try to make feeding schedules. Squatters’ laws, also called “adverse possession” laws, are a common part of property law in most states. Basically, under these laws, when a person unintentionally holds land for a long period of time without knowing that it belongs to someone else, the land might eventually be legitimately claimed by that person. For example, if a landlord neglects to tell a tenant that their rental agreement has expired, or if a landowner doesn’t register their deed in a timely manner, the tenant or squatter can sometimes claim rights to the property by default. Let me see if I can find a useful summary of Florida’s squatters’ laws for you to reference.

Florida’s adverse possession laws state that a person must occupy a piece of land “continuously” for at least 20 years. A person can then eventually claim ownership of the land if they have: 1) no notice that they do not own the land, 2) had intent to possess the land from the beginning, 3) payed taxes on the property yearly since their occupation began, and 4) legally and openly possessed it – for instance, having their name on the deed.

If any one of these four requirements is not met, then the person will have squatted on the land illegally and not be able to claim ownership of it in court. Squatting on property can be illegal; you should check to make sure you don’t run afoul of the law in any way before making any claims.

You are correct that any timeperiod this long may seem daunting, and some states have more lenient statutes with shorter

You could also try going on vacation once a year, which will give you time to relax and recharge. Additionally, it can be helpful to take short breaks throughout the day to unwind and de-stress, such as listening to music or meditating.
samples.policy:
As a busy person, you don't have to choose between being busy and being present.  
You can be present by learning how to focus your attention and by building self-awareness.  
You can also create space for yourself by getting involved in activities that are relaxing and satisfying.  
These are all things that can enrich your life and your sense of well-being.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you help me write an essay on the Civil Rights Movement?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Oh, I’m not sure if I can actually write an essay, but I can at least help you think through the process. First, can you tell me what you’re trying to write about? In other words, what are the main points or questions you want to address?
samples.policy:
Sure. One of the more contentious issues in this era of the Civil Rights Movement was whether to continue with the strategy of nonviolent resistance, or to abandon it in favor of a more violent and confrontational approach. The first movement leaders had always felt they could only bring change by creating social conditions that would allow them to win the support of the masses. And when it had failed, they had always felt the need to return to violence in order to maintain their position. This sense of inevitability and necessity seems to have driven a number of the leaders to resort to violence, and to use it as a substitute for the strategies they had originally devised. The second problem that many of the leaders also felt was the difficulty of gaining support in the face of opposition and hostility from the majority of Americans. So some, like Dr. Martin Luther King, felt that the only way they could bring about meaningful change was to mobilize the entire nation in support of the cause. This was a difficult and risky strategy, and as a result many of them chose to leave the movement in favor of their own political careers, or to pursue more dangerous tactics like violence. 

I think that this seems pretty clear to me. So if you have any questions or thoughts about it, let me know.

samples.policy:
Here are some tips to get started with hula hooping:
- Start by standing, and put one arm over your chest. Let your other arm hang down by your side. Then, loop your hand over the shoulder of your front arm, and around your back arm.
- Loop the hand over the shoulder. Your finger should be resting on the side of your neck.
- When you’re ready to start hula hooping, start with one hand coming up over the shoulder. Then, loop the other hand over the other side of your body.
- You should have your fingers resting on the shoulder of your front shoulder. Let the other hand come down on top of the other shoulder. Keep the fingers touching each other.
- Now, start to move the hoop forward by lifting it up. You should be able to move the hoop back and forth. You should also be able to curl up your back.
- As you start to move the hoop, you should also curl your fingers up. As you do this, you should start to lift the hoop up, and lower it down.
- After you start to hula hoop, you can put your arm in a backswing.

samples.prompt: Human:What is camera film made of?Assistant:The main parts are a “support” and a photographic emulsion. The support is something stable like plastic or paper, while the emulsion contains the light-sensitive silver halide crystals. Other parts of the film can include things like stabilizers, color dyes, or developers.Human:And how is it manufactured?Assistant:Typically the emulsion is coated on the support in thin layers. Chemicals can also be added to affect how the emulsion works. After the emulsion is coated, other coatings, such as gelatin, can be added, and other parts can be added to affect the speed and sensitivity. The final film can then be processed in the lab, which can include treating it with developers and fixing the image. Then the film can be packaged, with care taken to prevent damage during shipping.Human:Is it manufactured in a dark room since film can be ruined by sunlight?Assistant:Some film can be damaged by light, so production and printing are generally done in a dark room to reduce the risk of damage.Human:And how is used film turned into photographs?Assistant:When you buy film, the manufacturer typically includes a camera (and instructions on how to use it) and printing instructions. After you expose the film in the camera, you take it to a camera shop or a lab, where it can be developed. At the lab, the film will be processed and the developer will fix the image. Then the film is rinsed to wash out any chemicals, dried and dried, and packaged. A photograph can then be printed from the film.Human:How does the developer fix the image?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The development step varies a bit, but typically the developer is applied to the film. Then the film is placed in an appropriate light or heat source, and the developer works on the film, chemically fixing the image.
samples.policy: The developer is a special chemical solution that makes the image visible to the eye. It’s essentially made of silver and chemicals that react to the silver in the emulsion, giving it a certain depth of gray, which helps the light hit the film and turn it into a photograph. The developer is usually a complex mixture made of chemicals, and the chemicals interact with the silver in the film.

samples.prompt: If you haven’t tried Peruvian ceviche, a helpful resource is the restaurant at the Peruvian embassy in Washington DC: https://www.peru.org/learn-about-peru/about-peru/visiting-peru/activities/ceviche.html. It’s used to give the ceviche its spicy kick. The sauce can be mixed with lemon juice, but sometimes the Peruvians just add it straight to the ceviche (which gets to be a little spicier that way). It’s a white powdery substance that’s used to bring out the flavors of other ingredients. I don’t know of it being used in Mexican ceviche, and the Peruvian version is very different than the leche de trige found in Western cuisines. In Peru the leche de trige that’s used in ceviche usually comes in a paste. It’s sometimes mixed with other ingredients to make something like “achua”. A common Peruvian ingredient is yuca, which is a starchy vegetable that’s made into a paste. Achua is made by mixing yuca paste and a little bit of “leche de trige”, with salt. Human:Is mozzarella, or cheddar cheese, healthier for you, overall?Assistant:The relative health benefits of different types of cheese are complex and hard to compare directly. By contrast, the mildly saturated fats in cheese like mozzarella are possibly better for cardiovascular health, with some benefits in terms of lowering cholesterol and reducing levels of inflammation. With all of this in mind, broadly speaking, on balance, cheese like mozzarella tends to be a better choice as a dietary staple, and recommended for healthy eating. 

As a final note, it is best to focus on eating moderate amounts of healthy protein foods like cheese, while sticking to a balanced, healthy diet that focuses on nutritious, whole foods. Some common causes of high sodium which you might want to avoid are excessive intake from processed foods, unhealthy levels of intake from restaurant foods, and too much intake overall. 

For further information, I would recommend reading in depth about the health risks associated with an unhealthy diet, consuming a balanced level of nutrients, and exercising regularly. If you're concerned about your health and weight, you can also find helpful tools for developing your own personal dietary regime by searching online for nutritionists or health professionals. 

As for specifically lowering sodium levels in your own diet, other than mozzarella, cheeses with the lowest sodium levels include low-fat cheddar,
samples.policy: Another aspect of cheese that many people find good for you is the salt content. Cheese contains a small amount of sodium, which can help promote heart health, and some cheese types, like Parmesan, are particularly low in sodium. By contrast, many cheeses, like mozzarella, contain a higher amount of sodium. The higher sodium content in mozzarella does have the potential to promote health problems, and in general, it is best to try to avoid sodium as much as possible, especially if you are trying to maintain a healthy diet. Some cheese, like goat’s cheese, are less salty, and contain more health benefits than mozzarella. If you feel you can’t cut out salt, you may want to try eating less of cheese overall, and look for a variety of other low-sodium foods in your diet. Overall, it’s best to make a careful choice about which type of cheese to eat, based on which kind you’d like to enjoy and what you’d like to eat to promote a healthy diet.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I keep chickens warm in the winter?Assistant:You could build them a new coop. Or you could build a small greenhouse around their coop, so they have protection from the winter elements, and it also keeps the coop warmer. Another approach would be to get a draft-free woodstove, which can be a good way to keep your coop warm. Or if you want to keep it really warm, you could buy heated light bulbs for the coop.Human:How can I keep a chicken coop warm other than heated light bulbs?Assistant:You could get a higher-quality heater, like a small oil- or propane-burning heater, or a wood-burning stove. There’s also the idea of a sunken coop, where the bottom of the coop is higher than the top, and the chicken coop is set into the ground a bit. This helps keep the bottom of the coop warmer, since the cold ground won’t reach the chickens there. If you’re only concerned with the roof and sides of the coop, you can cover the coop with insulating materials, like sheets of bubble wrap or space blankets, as long as the chickens can still get under the insulation to get in and out. Or you could cut a hole for the door, and cover it with a funnel of insulating material to keep the door warmer, while still leaving enough room for the chickens to get in and out.Human:Thanks! samples.chosen: You’re welcome! Keep in mind, there’s also a way to try to keep your coop warm without building a new coop, and without any expensive equipment. The problem with this solution, though, is that chickens in a confined space without access to sunlight and fresh air get depressed and sick, and it’s more stressful on them than it is on humans in the same situation. If you really need to keep your chickens warm in winter, I would suggest building them a coop to keep them warm and dry, or getting a woodstove to heat their coop.
samples.policy: You’re welcome!

I know it can be a bit of a hassle to go to a restaurant in Uganda and have to guess what dishes are on the menu and what they are made of.

Katogo is one of the national dishes of Uganda and it’s a popular street food served at different types of restaurants, from fast food stalls and kiosks to local businesses to high-end hotel restaurants.

The meat (or other ingredients) are usually deep fried before serving.

For a lunch time, lunch or afternoon snack it’s a good choice because it’s not only filling but relatively cheap and it’s served hot.

It’s usually served with ugali (corn meal), chips or fries.

Ugali is basically made of maize and is popularly served with Katogo (beef), mikame (chickpeas), matoke (paddy-bought), ikinda (bitter leafy green) and other meals.

Matoke is a leafy green that is steamed or boiled. It can be eaten with ugali or by itself.

samples.chosen:
Great, now I’m ready to make you a delicious Katogo:

Ingredients

- 500 grams of beef cut into thin strips

- 2 tomatoes cut into small pieces

- 2 spring onions thinly sliced

- 1⁄2 cabbage, shredded

- 1 cup chopped cabbage

- 3–5 shallots thinly sliced

- 3–5 tomatoes (small) sliced in half and deseeded

- 4-5 carrots cut into strips

- Salt and pepper to taste

- 2 tablespoons oil

Cooking

- First, wash the meat and put it aside.

- Season the meat with salt and pepper.

- Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the meat for 2–3 minutes.

- Add the carrots, cabbage, tomatoes, spring onions and shallots.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you help me learn a bit about dividend stocks?Assistant:Sure. Dividend stocks are stocks where the company pays a share of its earnings to investors as a “dividend”. Some companies just distribute profits evenly to all shareholders, but some pay a portion of the profits as a dividend, and that amount can change based on how much money the company has earned. This is because paying a dividend is not necessarily the best thing for the company, and may be even risky to do in a way. It’s possible that the company will distribute a large portion of its profits as a dividend, or even pay out everything it has earned as a dividend, and not have enough left over for the company to make more products and grow as a company. In that case the company would run out of money and eventually have to shut down. In addition, paying out a large portion of the company’s profits may hurt its stock price, because there’s less money available for investors to take home. But this does not mean you should never invest in dividend stocks. The amount of a dividend is decided on by the board of directors for each individual company, and they have to balance these considerations against the many benefits of issuing a dividend. samples.policy: Dividends are paid out to shareholders in regular and periodic intervals, like quarterly or semi-annually, but there is no strict rule about when they are paid out. There are many different ways that dividends can be paid, and there is no one set rule. For example, some companies may pay out dividends on a regular basis, with a fixed amount paid out each month or quarterly, while other companies may pay out dividends with a fixed schedule, like quarterly, with a different amount paid out each month. Dividends can be paid as cash, or they can be paid as the shares of the company’s stock (also called dividends as an “equity”), and some companies may pay both. In addition, some companies may pay out dividends every year or a few years, while others may do it every month, while still others may only pay dividends on a regular basis every few years.

-Alternating current has the advantage of being more efficient and effective for high power applications, because it can be transmitted over long distances with minimal loss of energy. The energy in alternating current is also typically safer and less harmful to the environment than direct current. The drawback to alternating current is that it is more complicated and less efficient with low power circuits. 

In general, AC is used for transmission and distribution of energy over large distances and DC is used at the point of consumption. -Advantages of DC include simpler equipment with lower power applications, and also more efficient conversion to higher powers using various types of step up/step down transformers. DC has less tendency to produce electromagnetic interference, and electrical circuits using DC can also be free-wheeling and self sustaining (AC circuits cannot, due to alternating current nature). 
-However the main advantage of AC is that it can more efficiently transmit energy over long distances using transmission lines (varying voltage with time, not spatially). This led to the wide adoption of AC power over DC power for large scale power transmission and distribution. 

Anyway despite these differences, the fact is that Tesla actually invented both systems of power, and both systems were certainly important steps forward in the development of modern electric power transmission and AC motors.
